t: Amazon EC2 - Cloud Compute Capacity - AWS
s: 4 days ago - Amazon EC2 provides secure, resizable compute in the cloud, offering the broadest choice of processor, storage, networking, OS, and purchase model.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon - Koto Studio
s: 5 days ago - Together with Amazon’s in-house brand team, Amazon XCM, we built a new brand system that elevates Amazon’s most iconic assets: a warmer smile, a modernized logo, a flexible new typeface, a unified color palette, and a global architecture designed to move at the pace of Amazon.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 11 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

s: Amazon Web Services offers reliable, scalable, and inexpensive cloud computing services. Free to join, pay only for what you use.

t: Amazon Brand Store Guide | Awesome Dynamic
s: December 1, 2022 - An Amazon Brand Store is a multi-page website hosted by Amazon with a unique URL and links directly to product pages. It’s perfect for showcasing a brands’ products in detail with more flexibility to add visual elements like images and videos, and additional space for added text.
